title: Castle Story v0.1.0.6f02 (2013) PC (ENG)
description:
============================================
Castle Story v0.1.0.6f02 (2013) PC (ENG)
============================================

- ENG

- OFF SITE: http://castlestory.net/

============================================
Description:                               =
============================================

Castle Story is a creative voxel-based strategy game in which you can build castles one brick at a time using an army of little characters called "Bricktrons".Your goal will be to explore a vast landscape full of mysteries and dangers, and defend your castle against onslaughts of hostile creatures and perhaps even other players.

============================================
Instruction How to Create server:          =
============================================

1) Run "Create Server CastleStories" from desktop (minimize program and opened site ) DO NOT CLOSE
2) Run game with  "Castle Story" from your desktop
3) Multiplayer => Multiplayer Options (put here in field your "ip" from Tunngle)=>Join Game=>Join (to right from the picture) 
4) Wait for other players.

============================================
Instruction How to Join the game:          =
============================================

1) Enter the game with "Castle Story" from your desktop .
2) Multiplayer => Multiplayer Options (Put here "ip" of a person you want to join)=>Join Game=>Join (to right from the picture)
